title: What are some organizations that support the use of a scientific approach? - Quora

response.answer_text: True LEAN organisations will use the scientific method through e.g. the use of an A3 template. This is based on the PDSA (Dr. W. Edwards Deming) cycle. You describe the problem, describe the ideal situation, come up with possible reasons, investigate those, come up with potential counter measures, select one, run tests, gather before and after data, analyse the results*, implement the improvement, update the procedures and train/inform the employees. * If the analysis of the counter measure indicated that the objective isn't met, you start all over again.
